title: Jermaine Jones - Professional USA Soccer Player And What It's Like To Be A Vegan Athlete And Father Of A Plant Based Family
description:
Episode 08 of the Plant Proof podcast with Jermaine Jones, USA professional Soccer player & vegan. Jermaine grew up in Germany where he began his professional soccer career and eventually represented Germany before moving to Los Angeles and playing for the USA. Jermaine now resides in Malibu, California and his entire family, wife and 5 children, live a plant based lifestyle. He's a super down to earth guy and shares his story from a youngster all the way up to today including the magical goal he scored against Portugal in the 2014 world cup.  PLAY NOW: TWO WAYS YOU CAN HELP THE PLANT PROOF PODCAST GROW: 1 - Review If you enjoyed the episode and have a spare 1-2 minutes please leave a review on iTunes so the Plant Proof podcast ranks higher and becomes more discoverable for other listeners. 2- Share If you have any friends that you think will benefit from listening to this episode or any of the other Plant Proof episodes please share the link privately or on your social media profile/s - together we can make this world a healthier place. WHERE TO LISTEN TO THE PLANT PROOF PODCAST? Currently the Plant Proof podcast can be listened to on iTunes, Google Play, Stitcher, Soundcloud or on the Plantproof.com directly (this page). In the near future it will also be made available on Spotify . If you listen on iTunes be sure to hit 'subscribe' so you are instantly notified when I release new episodes.   
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
